channel.title: Posts on Axel Vanherle

item.title: How i got this site up and running.
item.description: Hello, so this post is just a quick explanation of how I got this website up and running. First of all, it’s hosted via GitHub pages. This makes it so I don’t have to go through any effort of setting this up myself, and it’s nice practice in case I need to use it some other time. Although an argument could be made that hosting my own site would have been better practice.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello world! This is just me playing around with HUGO, trying to figure things out.
